io.spine.server.rejection

Class RejectionReactorMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.model.HandlerMethod<io.spine.core.RejectionClass,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>
      • io.spine.server.rejection.RejectionReactorMethod

  • @Internal
public class RejectionReactorMethod
extends HandlerMethod<io.spine.core.RejectionClass,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>
    A wrapper for a rejection reactor method.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public java.util.List<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> invoke(java.lang.Object target,
                                                                    com.google.protobuf.Message rejectionMessage,
                                                                    io.spine.core.RejectionContext context)
        Invokes the wrapped handler method to handle rejectionMessage, commandMessage with the passed context of the Command.

        Unlike the overloaded alternative method, this one implies returning the value, being a reaction to the rejection passed.

        Overrides:
        invoke in class HandlerMethod<io.spine.core.RejectionClass,io.spine.core.RejectionContext>
        Parameters:
        target - the target object on which call the method
        rejectionMessage - the rejection message to handle
        context - the context of the rejection
        Returns:
        the list of event messages produced by the reacting method or empty list if no event messages were produced

      • factory

        public static HandlerMethod.Factory<RejectionReactorMethod> factory()
